name: fossil-bench
description: Head-to-head benchmark harness for Fossil vs Lix

scripts.bench: pnpm --filter js-sdk run build && pnpm --filter js-sdk run build:dist && pnpm --filter @lix-js/better-sqlite3-backend run build && pnpm run bench:run
scripts.bench:quick: BENCH_FILES_PER_CLASS=4 BENCH_UPDATE_ROUNDS=1 BENCH_HISTORY_READS=12 pnpm run bench
scripts.bench:lix-only: BENCH_TARGET=lix BENCH_FILES_PER_CLASS=2 BENCH_UPDATE_ROUNDS=1 BENCH_HISTORY_READS=6 pnpm run bench
